Class ClientApplet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      client.ClientApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, QuizClientServices, java.rmi.Remote, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ClientApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements QuizClientServices, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Author:
hannes Swing-based GUI client applet for Quizmaster
